description.Резолуција: WQXGA (2560x1600), IPS 350nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 165Hz, Dolby® Vision™, G-SYNC®, Free-Sync Premium, Low Blue Light
description.Графика: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 8GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2175MHz, TGP 140W
description.Аудио: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
description.Звучник: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
description.Порти: 2x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), 1x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), Always On, 1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4, 1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with DisplayPort™ 1.4, 1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz, 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45), 1x Card reader, 1x Power connector
